verses.verse: <S%H3863>Oh<s%> that you would <S%H7167>rend<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> that you would <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down,<s%> that the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> might <S%H5140>flow<s%> down at your <S%H6440>presence,<s%>

As when the <S%H2003>melting<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H6919>burns,<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> causes the <S%H4325>waters<s%> to <S%H1158>boil,<s%> to make your <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> to your <S%H6862>adversaries,<s%> that the <S%H1471>nations<s%> may <S%H7264>tremble<s%> at your <S%H6440>presence!<s%>

When you <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3372>terrible<s%> things which we <S%H6960>looked<s%> not for, you <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down,<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H5140>flowed<s%> down at your <S%H6440>presence.<s%>

For since the <S%H5769>beginning<s%> of the <S%H5769>world<s%> men have not <S%H8085>heard,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H238>perceived<s%> by the <S%H238>ear,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> has the <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H7200>seen,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H2108>beside<s%> you, what he has <S%H6213>prepared<s%> for him that <S%H2442>waits<s%> for him.

You <S%H6293>meet<s%> him that <S%H7797>rejoices<s%> and <S%H6213>works<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> those that <S%H2142>remember<s%> you in your <S%H1870>ways:<s%> <S%H2005>behold,<s%> you are <S%H7107>wroth;<s%> for we have <S%H2398>sinned:<s%> in <S%H1992>those<s%> is <S%H5769>continuance,<s%> and we shall be <S%H3467>saved.<s%>

But we are <S%H3605>all<s%> as an <S%H2931>unclean<s%> thing, and <S%H3605>all<s%> our <S%H6666>righteousnesses<s%> are as <S%H5708>filthy<s%> <S%H899>rags;<s%> and we <S%H3605>all<s%> do <S%H5034>fade<s%> as a <S%H5929>leaf;<s%> and our <S%H5771>iniquities,<s%> like the <S%H7307>wind,<s%> have <S%H5375>taken<s%> us away.

And there is <S%H369>none<s%> that <S%H7121>calls<s%> on your <S%H8034>name,<s%> that <S%H5782>stirs<s%> up himself to <S%H2388>take<s%> <S%H2388>hold<s%> of you: for you have <S%H5641>hid<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> from us, and have <S%H4127>consumed<s%> us, <S%H3027>because<s%> of our <S%H5771>iniquities.<s%>

But <S%H6258>now,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> you are our <S%H1>father;<s%> we are the <S%H2563>clay,<s%> and you our <S%H3335>potter;<s%> and we <S%H3605>all<s%> are the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

Be not <S%H7107>wroth<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3966>sore,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> for <S%H5703>ever:<s%> <S%H2005>behold,<s%> <S%H5027>see,<s%> we <S%H4994>beseech<s%> you, we are <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5971>people.<s%>
Your <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> are a <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> is a <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation.<s%>

Our <S%H6944>holy<s%> and our <S%H8597>beautiful<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> our <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H1984>praised<s%> you, is <S%H8316>burned<s%> up with <S%H784>fire:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> our <S%H4261>pleasant<s%> things are laid <S%H2723>waste.<s%>

Will you <S%H662>refrain<s%> yourself for <S%H428>these<s%> things, O <S%H3068>LORD?<s%> will you <S%H2814>hold<s%> your <S%H2814>peace,<s%> and <S%H6031>afflict<s%> us <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3966>sore?<s%>
